TEXT.TITLE: HOLZSTOFF AG <GHOZ.BS> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Net profit 25.5 mln Swiss francs vs 22.2 mln Turnover 717 mln vs 739 mln Cash flow 75.4 mln vs 58.1 mln Proposed dividend 70 francs vs same Note - Company plans one for two rights issue of 40,000 participation certificates of nominal 50 francs. Conditions not yet set. REUTER
